name: Network Monitor
description: Tracks the availability or presence of devices on the local network. For home automation, a common use is to trigger different events based on the presence or absence of a smartphone.
author: Chas-IoT

network_rescan_interval.description: The interval in minutes between a complete rescan of the network. To manually trigger a rescan, go to the Gateway main Things page and click add (+).

ping_batch_size.description: The number of ping commands in a batch. A small batch size will find devices more quickly however, on a large network, may overflow the number of simultaneous processes allowed. A large batch size may mean that the ARP cache times out before a device is detected.

logging.description: Write out significant events to the gateway log
